息も忘れて仕舞う位に\r\n: Ivy has entwined so much of my heart
過去が絡み合って解けなくなってんだ\r\n: The past is entangled with it and can't be untied
迷路の渦をなぞる手は\r\n: My hand tracing a vortex of labyrinths
激しくやさしくただ踊って\r\n: It just dances fiercely and gently
あたしを引っ張って止まらないの\r\n: Pulling me along and never stopping
ひとりきり\r\n: I'm all alone dancing in variation
月が街を溶くメランコリ\r\n: The moon melts the city in melancholy
もう少しドラマチックに踊りたかったのに\r\n: I just wanted to dance a bit more dramatically
消えて散ったその残骸に\r\n: And scattered long ago in its wreckage
夢現ひかって流線型を描いた\r\n: I drew a shiny streamlined shape
あたしは何を描き\r\n: What do I want to draw?
何を残したい未来に\r\n: What do I want to leave behind for the future?
忘れて仕舞う位に\r\n: has entwined so much of my heart
あと少しドラマチックに踊らせてよアイヴイ\r\n: Let me dance a bit more dramatically, Ivy
何かを解くようにあたしは歌ってんだ\r\n: I'm singing as if I'm solving for something
